mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_msg(mm_msg_id, emp_id, mm_msg_type, mm_msg_title, mm_msg_content, dateline, is_del, is_top, top_num, mm_msg_picurl) VALUES (#{mm_msg_id}, #{emp_id}, #{mm_msg_type}, #{mm_msg_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mm_msg_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateline}, #{is_del}, #{is_top}, #{top_num}, #{mm_msg_picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_msg SET is_del=#{is_del}, is_top=#{is_top} , top_num=#{top_num}, mm_msg_type=#{mm_msg_type}, mm_msg_content=#{mm_msg_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mm_msg_title=#{mm_msg_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE mm_msg_id=#{mm_msg_id}
UPDATE mm_msg SET is_del='1' WHERE mm_msg_id=#{mm_msg_id}
